channel.title: Posts on MADTECC 24
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on MADTECC 24

item.title: Call for papers
item.description: Recent trends in computer science promoted new ways to think about software at both design time and run time. Next-generation intelligent pervasive systems will be modelled as digital twins that are counterparts of physical objects and executed in parallel. Moreover, combining the mirroring of the physical entities – that allows for continuous observation of the real world and the corresponding update of the digital replica – with computational intelligence enables the individual devices to operate responsibly towards their goals.
